TEXT.TITLE: SUFFIELD <SPCP> COMPLETES COASTAL <CSBK> BUY
TEXT.BODY: Suffield Financial Corp said it has completed the acquisition of Coastal Bancorp of Portland, Maine, in an exchange of 2.05655 Suffield shares for each Coastal share. Reuter
